title: FEUDALISM WAS NICE (Bloch-Fossier-Grimal-Le Goff)
description:
Feudalism was hated by the intellectuals of the 18 century , but the 

       truth is that the system proved to be the only true door towards the 

       industrial revolution , as the failure of Russia and the islamic countries

       to produce a private-owned precapitalist agriculutre shows.

       Books:

       Grimal la civilization romaine
       Le Goff la civilisation de la moyen age
       Fossier Gens du Moyen Age

       and of course

       Marc Bloch La societÃƒÂ© f. (also in english , which ressembles like drinking
                                 bourdeaux wine in a plastic glass)




       There is also a folder "Philosophie" with more french letters for those

       interested.
